meta.description: Optimize the number of glass and plastic bottles produced given water constraints and customer preferences.

sets.name: BOTTLE_TYPES
sets.description: Types of bottles available for production.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each bottle type in ml.

vars.name: num_bottles
vars.description: Number of bottles to produce for each type.

objective.name: max_total_bottles
objective.description: Maximize the total number of bottles produced.

constraints.name: water_capacity_constraint
constraints.description: Total water used by bottles must not exceed available water.

constraints.name: plastic_bottle_preference
constraints.description: Number of plastic bottles must be at least three times the number of glass bottles.

constraints.name: minimum_glass_bottles
constraints.description: There must be at least 20 glass bottles.
